_comment: English translations for Laravel Cheat Code

laravel.description: Laravel is an expressive and progressive PHP web application framework. Reference for common Laravel 8 commands and features.

要件.title: Requirements
要件.code:
# PHP version >= 7.3
# BCMath PHP Extension
# Ctype PHP Extension
# Fileinfo PHP Extension
# JSON PHP Extension
# Mbstring PHP Extension
# OpenSSL PHP Extension
# PDO PHP Extension
# Tokenizer PHP Extension
# XML PHP Extension

Composerでインストール.title: Install with Composer
Composerでインストール.code:
$ composer create-project laravel/laravel example-app
$ cd example-app
$ php artisan serve

Dockerでインストール.title: Install with Docker
Dockerでインストール.code:
$ curl -s https://laravel.build/example-app | bash
$ cd example-app
$ ./vendor/bin/sail up

.env値の取得.title: Retrieving .env Values

ログレベル.title: Log Levels

コンテキスト情報.title: Context Information
コンテキスト情報.code:
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;

Log::info('User failed to login.', ['id' => $user->id]);
